questions.question: What is a primary risk of using an unsecured Wi-Fi network?
Which type of attack involves setting up a fraudulent Wi-Fi network to steal user data?
How does a Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attack compromise security?
options: By blocking access to certain websites
By secretly intercepting and altering communication between devices
By flooding the network with excessive traffic
questions.correctAnswer: By secretly intercepting and altering communication between devices

questions.question: Which security measure can help encrypt your internet traffic on public Wi-Fi networks?
options: Using incognito mode in a browser

questions.question: What is a sign that you might be connected to an Evil Twin network?
options: A duplicate Wi-Fi network with the same name
A requirement to accept new terms and conditions
No need for a password to connect
questions.correctAnswer: A duplicate Wi-Fi network with the same name

questions.question: Which website protocol indicates a secure connection?
What is the role of a firewall in network security?
options: To physically protect the router from damage
To monitor and block unauthorized connections
To improve the speed of the network
questions.correctAnswer: To monitor and block unauthorized connections
